==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* {{lang|''Vissudha''|sa=विशुद्ध|sa_tl=especially pure}} is the fifth primary chakra according to the Hindu tradition of tantra. It symbolizes purity.
* In the Chinese name of Vissudha Field, {{Lang|''Èrjìng''|zh=二净|zh_tl=Double Purification}} refers to {{lang|''Suddhi''|sa=शुद्धि|sa_tl=Purification}}, an inner state which is free from human desires and passions in Buddhism.
